name: Road of Life
description:
Made for Wowie Jam 3.0

Road of Life is a reverse tower defense game where your goal is to let as much enemies into your base as possible. During the game you'll have to place different healing towers to help enemies on their way to your base as their health is rapidly declining.

Controls:

- Mouse

Credits:

- Code and art done by me

- Music made by HeatleyBros 
https://www.audiomicro.com/artist/heatleybros
